thread.title: Don't trust the late check out
thread.title_full: Don't trust the late check out - Review of The Westin New York at Times Square, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: epmc
title: Don't trust the late check out
text:
We were told we had til 3:00 pm on a Sunday to checkout. When we got back from running the NYC half marathon at 11:45, key did not work. We were able to have the door reopened but no one would acknowledge that we had a 3:00 checkout. It was like talking to the walls
Room Tip: Walls super thin. Neighbors playing extremely loud music with many people in room See more room tips
